title: League Is Broken I Need A Fix
body: I am currently on the league of legends client and it says I am in my previous game I cannot join another game and it is offering me to reconnect and every time I do it says it cant connect to the server. Please Help

replies.body: mine is slightly different.. I got disconnected 12 mins into a game and can't reconnect back!! and I was winning!
I've had the same problem for the past hour or two, so you're not alone!!
